scripts.start:docker: docker build --tag "fangroup" . && docker run -p 3000:3000 --name fangroup --detach fangroup
scripts.docker:restart: (docker rm $(docker stop $(docker ps -a -q --filter ancestor=fangroup --format="{{.ID}}")) && npm run docker) || npm run docker
scripts.copy:register: docker cp (docker container ls  | grep 'fangroup' | awk '{print $1}'):/app/registros.json /home/diogo/Documentos/fangroup/registros.json
